name: GroupMe Monokai
description:
A Sublime/Monokai Style for GroupMe.

Thank you to the creator of the GroupMe Dark theme. (https://userstyles.org/styles/107018/groupme-dark)

The code is available on GitHub at https://github.com/8bitg/GroupMeMonokai


Thanks for using this!

- @8bitg
additional_info:
Changes:

4.1.15 - Restyled the Calendar Events feature.
4.3.15 - Fixed navbar button hover - Needed "!important" to force the override.
5.7.15 - Fixed Events/Settings Modals
6.17.15 - Updated padding overflow issues for items in left-side tray

discussions.name: I would not download a car, but will this theme
